official_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Investigating Cold Snare aNd Forcep polypectomY Among Small POLYPs in Rates of Complete Resection: the TINYPOLYP Trial.
inclusion_criteria:
* Patients 18 years or older
* Polyps <=3mm
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Pregnant
* Inflammatory bowel disease
* Polyposis syndromes
